Meaning: A unique, anonymized identifier for the user who wrote the review.
The Amazon Standard Identification Number — a unique product ID.
Name displayed publicly for the reviewer. May be missing (NA) in some cases.
A two-number vector [x, y] showing [# ppl who marked helpful, # votes received]
The full text of the customer’s written review.
The star rating assigned by the reviewer (1 through 5)
A short, user-written title summarizing the review.
Review date expressed as seconds since January 1, 1970 (UNIX epoch).
Text version of the review date (MM DD, YYYY) or (MM D, YYYY)
